attributes.review: i got this app bc i was hungry and looking at this man reminded me of the episode from the magic school bus when Arnold ate all of the carrot chips and turned orange, but that’s not the point. the point is that my children where scarred for life after this their alphabet only has 21 letters as i have removed the following t, r,u,m, and p. where is mrs.frizzle when you need her bc i could really use her help rn. i mean it can’t be that much of a hassle to run him over with a bus, right?

attributes.title: Honey no just no

attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app and show support for Mr.Trump however when i entered the app it wasn’t at all what i was expecting. I immediately was met with disgusting graphic images of a man that seems to have died his skin orange and is extremely obese. Due to the fright this caused I quickly closed the app only to find that the background on my phone had been changed to one of these images and my camera roll was now full of them. Additionally the words vote for donald trump began to play out of my speakers and it was impossible to stop. Due to this I realized the app had unleashed a virus onto my device in order to attempt to brainwash me into voting for Trump. I deleted the app immediately and I recommend no one downloads this app and falls for the trick. Please stay safe everyone and god bless your souls.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIFIED

attributes.review: I am beyond disgusted with the app overall.😡 as soon as i opened the app it bombarded me with pop-ups requesting that I sell my soul to president donald jermaine trump🤭! I was beyond astonished😟. idk about you guys but I like my soul right where it is😕. so unless you want to make a deal with the devil 👿himself, DO NOT DOWNLOAD.😾. #Mr.SoulSnatcherIsNotMyPrez ✊🏾
attributes.title: DON’T DO IT DAWG.
